RumorFact.Text: I detected a chiming signal coming from Ember Twin.

ExploreFact.Text: I found a set of crystalline cairns on ember twin. Two were in a language composed of symbols, the other two were in Nomai script. They contain a first-contact message from an unknown species to the Nomai. The species claims to originate from a previous universe. The message offers great knowledge to the Nomai when the time has come.
